p: From a general point of view, De Marco et al. [ 19] and Schiavone et al. [ 21] speculated that chitin can negatively affect the digestibility of protein and reduce the general digestion of DM. Nevertheless, these authors pointed out that TM and full-fat or partially defatted HI meals can be an excellent source of energy and digestible AA for broiler chickens, regardless of the presence of chitin.
